name: Whack-A-Wraiccoon
description:
Whack-A-Wraiccoon is a Snuffy fangame I made for her birthday!
It's a whack-a-mole game you can play using your mouse, drawing tablet, twitch chat, and twitch redeems!

How to play

Solo: Click on the wraiccoons when they pop up!
Twitch Chat: Say in the Twitch Chat a number between 1 and 7 to whack one of the 7 wraiccoon holes!
Twitch Redeems: Use the Twitch Point Redeems to whack one of the 7 wraiccoons holes!

Each wraiccoon is worth 1 point.

Rounds last 30 seconds, and you are allowed to move to the next round only if you miss less than 33% of the wraiccoons!
Every round makes the game go faster!

Features

- Classic gameplay but cuter
- Twitch integration with chat-based input and redeem-based input.
- Online leaderboards! Please let me know on Twitter if someone has an inappropriate name, I'll ban them.

Credits

- Art, design, development: MonAmiral
- Music: shimtone, marron field, MagaMaga
